HomePage.title: Our Special Offers
HomePage.description: This is a sample page for your multilingual website.

Popular.serviceans: We are the only OTA that offers a bundle of unique services to ensure an excellent and unforgettable travel experience.
Popular.flightans: Hassle-free domestic and international flight reservations at competitive rates.
Popular.hotelans: Access over 2 million accommodation options globally — from budget stays to premium hotels.
Popular.transportans: Reliable airport transfers, car rentals, and intercity travel solutions across destinations.
Popular.insuranceans: Secure your travel with comprehensive insurance plans for a worry-free experience.
Popular.visaans: Expert support for eVisa processing and embassy documentation worldwide.
Popular.forexans: Fast and safe currency exchange services with the best market rates.
Popular.esimans: Stay connected in any country with seamless eSIM plans — no physical SIM required.
Popular.marriageans: Experience vibrant Indian culture by joining destination weddings and traditional ceremonies.
Popular.internshipans: Global internship placement assistance for students seeking exposure and career growth abroad.
Popular.cruiseans: Discover luxury at sea with our curated cruise packages and private charter bookings.
Popular.holidayans: Customizable domestic and international holiday packages for families, couples, groups, and corporates.

Bookwithus.des1: Our user-friendly platform simplifies the process of reserving flights, hotels, bus tickets, and holiday packages.
Bookwithus.des2: Our advanced search technology compares a wide range of options to ensure you get the best deals available.
Bookwithus.des3: From exclusive discounts on flights and hotels to special offers on bus services and holiday packages, our platform is designed to help you
Bookwithus.des4: Our dedicated team is available 24/7 to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have throughout your travel journey.
Bookwithus.packages: Search Flights, Hotels, Bus and Holiday Packages
Bookwithus.packageans: At Next Gen, we're dedicated to turning your holiday dreams into reality. With cheap flights, elegant hotels, trustworthy buses to exciting holiday packages, we've got you taken care of. Our flight comparer lets you compare numerous airlines to find the cheapest rate, allowing the booking process to be a walk in the park. For hotels, we have a wide selection of luxury suites as well as budget hotels, along with customer feedback and deals. For easy and comfortable bus travel, our site introduces you to reputable operators for both daily city commutes and intercity travel. And for visiting a new destination, our holiday offers plenty of options, ranging from relaxing beach holidays to adventurous mountain retreats. With Next Gen, all the details of your travel are taken care of, so you can simply enjoy your journey.

FreshTravel.travelblogdes1: Discover new and exciting places to visit, to popular hotspots.
FreshTravel.travelblogdes2: Receive valuable advice and tips from seasoned travel experts..
FreshTravel.travelblogdes3: Stay informed about the latest travel trends and innovations to enhance your journey.
FreshTravel.travelblogdes4: Read engaging travel stories and experiences from fellow travelers.

footer.sub2: Subscribe now and get the latest travel  Trip, destination guides, and exclusive offers straight to your inbox. Your next adventure awaits!
footer.text1: At Next Gen, we’re dedicated to turning your travel dreams into reality. Whether you're seeking affordable flights,  luxurious hotels, reliable bus services, or exciting holiday  packages, we’ve got you covered. Our flight search tool allows you to compare numerous airlines to find the best deal,  ensuring a seamless booking experience. When it comes to accommodations, we offer a vast selection of hotels ranging  from opulent suites to budget-friendly options, complete with  guest reviews and exclusive deals.

flight.memorable: Book your flight ticket with Next Gen for a memorable experience.
flight.memorable_1: Next Gen is a reliable travel agent in India, which offers great deals on air tickets. Book flights for all destinations across India or the world at the lowest airfares with us. As one of the leading travel portals of India, we constantly endeavour to make your vacation memorable. So, why go anywhere else? Call us to save big on all kinds of travel products/services and have a memorable travel experience on a small budget. We believe in creating awesome vacations for our clients through customized holiday packages & tours. Enjoy great savings on flights, hotels and holiday trips with Next Gen.
flight.memorable_2: Next Gen is a reliable travel agent in India, which offers great deals on air tickets. Book flights for all destinations across India or the world at the lowest airfares with us. As one of the leading travel portals of India, we constantly endeavour to make your vacation memorable. So, why go anywhere else? Call us to save big on all kinds of travel products/services and have a memorable travel experience on a small budget. We believe in creating awesome vacations for our clients through customized holiday packages & tours. Enjoy great savings on flights, hotels and holiday trips with Next Gen.
flight.questions1: How do I book a tour?
flight.ans1: You can book a tour through our website, by phone, or by visiting our office.
flight.ans2: Our cancellation policy varies depending on the tour. Please refer to the specific tour details or contact us for more information.
flight.ans3: Yes, we specialize in creating custom itineraries tailored to your preferences. Contact us to discuss your travel plans.
flight.ans4: Travel insurance is not included but can be arranged upon request. We highly recommend purchasing travel insurance for your trip.
flight.questions5: How can I get updates on travel restrictions?
flight.ans5: We provide the latest travel updates on our blog and social media channels. You can also contact us directly for specific information.

about2.about1: We are passionate about delivering exceptional value and creating memorable experiences.
about2.about2: We also believe that travel is about more than just visiting new destinations; it's about creating memories that last a lifetime. Whether you're seeking adventure, cultural immersion, relaxation or a mix of everything, we design itineraries that offer unique and enriching experiences. Our goal is to help you discover the world in a way that is meaningful and memorable.
about2.about3: Our commitment to you starts with meticulous planning and extends through every moment of your adventure. We believe in taking care of all the details so you can focus on enjoying your trip. From the initial consultation to the moment you return home, our team is with you every step of the way, providing personalized service and support.
about2.about4: At Next Gen, we pride ourselves on our expertise and deep knowledge of destinations around the world. Our team is composed of seasoned travellers and industry professionals who are passionate about delivering exceptional travel experiences. We take the time to understand your preferences, interests and needs, ensuring that every aspect of your journey is tailored to you.
about2.about5: Safety and security are at the forefront of our operations. We work diligently to ensure that all our partners, accommodations and activities adhere to the highest standards. Your well-being is our top priority and we implement rigorous safety protocols to give you peace of mind while you explore new places.
about2.about6: We also believe that travel is about more than just visiting new destinations; it's about creating memories that last a lifetime. Whether you're seeking adventure, cultural immersion, relaxation or a mix of everything, we design itineraries that offer unique and enriching experiences. Our goal is to help you discover the world in a way that is meaningful and memorable.
about2.about7: Thank you for considering Next Gen for your travel needs. We look forward to crafting a journey that not only meets but exceeds your expectations, turning your travel dreams into reality

atibharat.swiperdata1: Seeking an adrenaline rush? From trekking through the Amazon Rainforest to climbing the peaks of the Andes or experiencing the thrill of a safari in Kenya, our adventure travel experiences will push your limits and immerse you in nature’s beauty.
atibharat.swiperdata2: Dive deep into the heart of new cultures. Explore ancient ruins, participate in local festivals, and engage with artisans in far-flung villages. Next Gen opens the doors to experiences that help you truly understand and appreciate the world’s rich diversity.
atibharat.swiperdata3: Want to experience the world in ultimate comfort? Our luxury travel experiences offer private villas, five-star resorts, and exclusive guided tours to ensure that your travels are as luxurious as they are unforgettable.
atibharat.swiperdata4: Travel responsibly with Next Gen’s eco-friendly travel options. Whether it’s staying in eco-lodges, supporting local communities, or experiencing nature reserves, we offer sustainable travel options that ensure your adventures leave a positive impact on the planet.
atibharat.swiperdata5: Traveling with loved ones? Our family-friendly itineraries are designed with everyone in mind, combining exciting activities for kids with relaxing downtime for adults. Create lifelong memories together as you explore the world as a family.
atibharat.swiperdata6: Whether you’re embarking on a solo backpacking adventure or seeking a peaceful retreat, Next Gen offers solo travel experiences that empower you to explore at your own pace and immerse yourself in new destinations.
